groups.label: WindowWait_TitleTutorial_SettingResult
groups.text:
You can change your creator
name or stylus hand later
in the Settings menu.

groups.label: WindowMessageUpper_SaveTutorial_Save
groups.text: Simply tap Save.

groups.label: WindowMessage_TitleTutorial_End
groups.text:
That's all for now.
I hope you enjoy creating
your own exciting flipnotes!

Adiós, amigo!

groups.label: WindowMessage_DrawTutorial_StartConfirm_Ok
groups.text: Yes, please

groups.label: WindowMessageUpper_DepthEditTutorial
groups.text:
You can adjust the 3D depth.

Try moving the bar below for each
page and see what happens.

Tap  to exit.

groups.label: WindowMessage_TitleTutorial_SampleMemo_Cancel
groups.text: Not right now

groups.label: WindowMessage_DrawTutorial_SuggestMenu
groups.text:
In addition to the pen, there
are other handy tools you
can use to make flipnotes.

groups.label: WindowMessageUpper_DrawTutorial_ExplainMenu_Right
groups.text:
There are all sorts of
different tools. Try some 
out to see how they work.

If you get lost, press  to
go back to the page.

groups.label: WindowMessage_TitleTutorial_SampleMemo_Ok
groups.text: Get samples

groups.label: WindowMessage_DrawTutorial_StartDrawing
groups.text:
Think of the Touch Screen
as a blank page, and use
your stylus to draw
a quick sketch!

groups.label: WindowMessageUpper_SoundEditTutorial
groups.text:
You can record sound and music
here and add them to your flipnote.
Tap one of the small red circles
to record a sound effect, and then
tap Audio Sequencer to continue.
Tap  to exit.

groups.label: WindowMessage_TitleTutorial_End_Next
groups.text: OK

groups.label: WindowMessage_DrawTutorial_Finish_02_Next
groups.text: Finish

groups.label: WindowMessageUpper_DrawTutorial_SuggestSave
groups.text:
When you are finished working on your
flipnote, tap Save/Quit below.

You've worked hard on your
flipnote, so be sure to save it!

groups.label: WindowMessage_WatchTutorial_Finish
groups.text:
I hope that'll come in handy!
That's all for now.

Adiós, amigo!

groups.label: WindowMessage_DrawTutorial_Finish_00
groups.text:
That's the end of the flipnote 
creation tutorial.

Hope you got all that!

groups.label: WindowMessage_DrawTutorial_Finish_01
groups.text:
Oh, one more thing!

Tap the Quit icon at the
bottom to go back to the 
title screen.

groups.label: WindowMessage_DrawTutorial_Cancel_Finish
groups.text:
You should be ready to go!

Have fun making your own
animated flipnotes!

Adiós, amigo!

groups.label: WindowMessage_DrawTutorial_Finish_02
groups.text:
You should be ready to go!

Have fun making your own
animated flipnotes!

Adiós, amigo!

groups.label: WindowMessage_TitleTutorial_Manual
groups.text:
If you need any help,
press  to open the
HOME Menu, and 
then tap Manual.

groups.label: WindowMessageUpper_FlagSequencerTutorial
groups.text:
Add a flag to a page to make
a sound effect start playing
on that page.

Check the manual for details.

groups.label: WindowMessage_DrawTutorial_StartConfirm_Cancel
groups.text: No, thanks

groups.label: WindowMessageUpper_DrawTutorial_ExplainMenu_Left
groups.text:
There are all sorts of
different tools. Try them
out to see how they work.

If you get lost, press  to
go back to the page.

groups.label: WindowMessageUpper_FrameEditTutorial
groups.text:
Here you'll find tools for editing
your flipnote timeline. For instance,
you can add pages or copy and
paste existing ones.

Tap  to exit.

groups.label: WindowMessage_DrawTutorial_OpenMenu_Right
groups.text:
Press  to open the 
tools menu.

groups.label: WindowMessage_TitleTutorial_Welcome01
groups.text: Welcome to Flipnote Studio 3D!

groups.label: WindowMessage_DrawTutorial_ExplainFrog
groups.text:
Oh, and by the way...

If you want to get back to
the tools menu, you can
tap on me anytime.

groups.label: WindowMessage_TitleTutorial_Welcome02
groups.text:
Flipnote Studio 3D is a 
unique drawing application 
that allows you to create 
animated flip books.
Now, let's learn more!

groups.label: WindowMessage_DrawTutorial_ReConfirm_Ok
groups.text: Yep, I'm sure

groups.label: WindowMessage_TitleTutorial_Welcome03
groups.text:
Wait a sec...

Before we get started, let's 
find out a bit more about you.

groups.label: WindowWait_TitleTutorial_HandSetting
groups.text:
Excellent!

Now, which hand do you use 
to hold the stylus?

groups.label: WindowMessage_TitleTutorial_CreatorName
groups.text:
First, please tell me
your name.
This will be used as your 
creator name for 
flipnotes you make.

groups.label: WindowMessage_WatchTutorial_TouchMemo_01
groups.text:
Tap Edit to work on a
flipnote, or tap Details
to see information about it.

groups.label: WindowMessage_WatchTutorial_TouchMemo
groups.text:
Hey there!

I see you found the 
sample flipnotes!

groups.label: WindowMessage_DrawTutorial_OpenMenu_Left
groups.text:
Press  to open the 
tools menu.

groups.label: WindowMessage_WatchTutorial_Finish_Next
groups.text: Finish

groups.label: WindowMessage_DrawTutorial_StartConfirm
groups.text:
Hi again!

Would you like me to explain
how to create flipnotes?

groups.label: WindowMessage_DrawTutorial_PageChange_Left
groups.text:
OK!
Next...

Press / to flip the pages.

groups.label: WindowMessage_DrawTutorial_Cancel_Finish_Next
groups.text: Finish

groups.label: WindowMessage_DrawTutorial_PageChange_Right
groups.text:
Nice!
Moving on...

Press  to flip the pages.

groups.label: WindowMessage_DrawTutorial_ReConfirm
groups.text:
Are you sure you don't
want an explanation?

groups.label: WindowMessage_TitleTutorial_SampleMemo
groups.text:
And one more thing...
Would you like some sample
flipnotes?

You can also get them later
from the Settings menu.

groups.label: WindowMessage_TitleTutorial_Thanks
groups.text:
Got it!

Thanks a lot.

groups.label: WindowMessage_DrawTutorial_Manual
groups.text:
All righty, then!

If you run into trouble,
press  to open the
HOME Menu, and
then tap Manual.
